row.process:
:DEFINE &AGENT_KEY#, string :DEFINE &SM_KEY#, string :SET &CHECK# = STR_STARTS_WITH(&UC4RB_TARGET_OS_DIS_ARCH#, "Windows") :IF &CHECK# EQ "Y" : SET &AGENT_KEY# = "Agent Windows" : SET &SM_KEY# = "SM Windows" :ELSE : SET &AGENT_KEY# = "Agent Linux" : SET &SM_KEY# = "SM Linux" :ENDIF
:set &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR_XML("PCK.AUTOMIC_AGENT_DEPLOYMENT.PRV.STORE.INI", &AGENT_KEY#, "/xml") :SET &RET# = WRITE_PROCESS(&HND#, "&UC4RB_AGENT_INI_FILE#", &AGENT#, &LOGIN#, OVERWRITE) :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :set &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR_XML("PCK.AUTOMIC_AGENT_DEPLOYMENT.PRV.STORE.INI", &SM_KEY#, "/xml") :SET &RET# = WRITE_PROCESS(&HND#, "&UC4RB_SM_INI_FILE#", &AGENT#, &LOGIN#, OVERWRITE) :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
